medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sudden onset of pain began 1.5 days prior to admission, specifically at 6 PM the night before admission. The pain has remained in the right lower quadrant without migration, radiation, or significant change since onset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Essential hypertension, hypertensive cardiomyopathy (most recent EF 50%), borderline glucose intolerance, borderline hypothyroidism, past surgical history includes left inguinal hernia repair and spinal surgery.
